main event: A flying saucer was reportedly seen over Calcutta, India on October 31, 1954.
interesting points: The report is based on an article from the 'Hindustan Standard' newspaper.
The sighting was reported to have occurred in Calcutta, India.
The sighting was reported on November 28, 1954.
The duration of the observation is unknown.
There are no photographs included with the report.
